mapper.insert: INSERT INTO imagination_playground.qna_question (user_id, title, content, qna_type, secret, completed, created_date, modified_date) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{qna_type}, #{secret}, 0, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM imagination_playground.qna_question ORDER BY created_date ASC LIMIT #{page}, #{page_last}

SELECT q.email, u.id, u.user_id, u.title, u.content, u.secret, u.completed, u.created_date, u.modified_date FROM imagination_playground.qna_question q LEFT OUTER JOIN imagination_playground.user u ON u.id = q.user_id WHERE email = #{email} ORDER BY created_date ASC
SELECT * FROM imagination_playground.qna_question WHERE ${key} LIKE(CONCAT("%", ${value}, "%")) ORDER BY created_date ASC LIMIT #{page}, #{page_last}

SELECT q.email, u.id, u.user_id, u.title, u.content, u.secret, u.completed, u.created_date, u.modified_date FROM imagination_playground.qna_question q LEFT OUTER JOIN imagination_playground.user u ON u.id = q.user_id WHERE ${key} LIKE(CONCAT("%", ${value}, "%")) AND email = #{email} ORDER BY created_date ASC LIMIT #{page}, #{page_last}
SELECT * FROM imagination_playground.user_baby WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND id = #{baby_id}

SELECT * FROM imagination_playground.user_baby baby LEFT OUTER JOIN imagination_playground.baby_recoed record ON baby.id = record.baby_id WHERE id = #{baby_id} AND user_id = #{user_id} ORDER BY recorded_date ASC
